short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily import candidate profiles by navigating to the contact's LinkedIn profile and click 'Add from LinkedIn'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Springboard to complement your candidate sourcing from LinkedIn. Easily import candidate profiles by navigating to the contact's LinkedIn profile and click "Add from LinkedIn". Engage and maintain meaningful relationships with your candidates on Springboard with content, increasing ROI on your sourcing efforts and retaining the top talent in the market. To learn more, visit https://www.springboard-tech.com. Sign up and get started building your talent pool today with Springboard at: https://www.springboard-tech.com/core-sign-up-form.
